ValidationRule.description: Validates if for Partner or Affiliate, the required billing fields are set (Billing Address and VAT Number)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Collective') || ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Partner'), OR( ISPICKVAL(BillingCountryCode, ''), ISBLANK(BillingCity), ISBLANK(BillingStreet), ISBLANK(BillingPostalCode), ISBLANK(COMM_VATNumber__c) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Fill in VAT Number and Billing Address for Partner/Affiliate
